data.title: 4+1 Reasons to Fall in Love with Crete
data.meta_description: Discover the 4+1 reasons why you'll fall in love with Crete! From its rich history and authentic cuisine to stunning beaches and organized tours, Crete is waiting for you to explore.
data.text:
Culture: Few islands boast such a long and rich history! Crete is the cradle of the Minoan civilization, one of the first advanced civilizations in Europe. Explore the Minoan palaces of Knossos, Phaistos, Malia, and Zakros, the archaeological sites of ancient Gortyn, Eleutherna, Lyttos, Aptera, Falasarna, Spinalonga, and the Venetian harbors of Chania, Heraklion, and Rethymno.

Gastronomy: Cretan cuisine is a reason in itself to visit the island. Based on fresh local produce, herbs, and olive oil, it is one of the most flavorful cuisines in the world. Try traditional delicacies such as snails cooked in wine, apaki (smoked pork), kalitsounia (cheese pies), Sfakian pies, and antikristo (roasted lamb), and accompany your meal with raki, like the locals do!

Old towns and traditional villages: For an atmosphere of another era! Wander through the picturesque alleys of Chania and Rethymno and admire the Venetian and Ottoman architecture. Or discover authentic Cretan culture in the mountain villages, such as Archanes, Zaros, and Asites in Heraklion, Vamos and Chora Sfakion in Chania, Anogia, Axos, and Margarites in Rethymno, and Makrygialos and Kritsa in Lasithi.

Nature and beaches: Explore the majestic mountains, the impressive gorges of Samaria and Imbros, the caves, the lakes of Kournas and Preveli, and the plateaus of Lasithi and Nida. Swim in the magical waters and relax on the soft sand of countless beaches in Crete, such as Balos, Falasarna, Elafonisi, Ammoudara, and Elounda.
